title: Raise the Minimum Wage Scenario FRQ

content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate. Describe the ideology that supports the policy issue described in the scenario. Explain how the ideological perspective, described in Part A, affects the legislative process in Congress on the policy issue. Explain how a major political event, such as the recession that began in 2008, could influence how citizens would behave politically in the context of the scenario.
